entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers changing to 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming sunny late in the morning. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 8. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 1 May 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
